content.p: As a research led institution, we recognise the value and contribution of early career researchers in delivering our ambitious, high-quality research strategy. We will enhance this vital aspect of our research network by recruiting 100 Nottingham Research and Anne McLaren Fellows by the end of 2022. Additionally, we support applications for externally funded fellowships available from funding bodies, charities and institutions targeted at early career researchers. Our Anne McLaren and Nottingham Research Fellowship schemes produce the next generation of outstanding research leaders. Find out about a range of fellowships available from funding bodies, charities and institutions targeted at early career researchers.
